SELECT id FROM regions WHERE ST_Contains(polygon, ST_GeomFromText(#{wkt}, 5186)) LIMIT 1

SELECT r.id AS regionId, r.sgg_nm AS name, ST_X(ST_Centroid(r.polygon)) AS x, ST_Y(ST_Centroid(r.polygon)) AS y, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cctvs c WHERE c.region_id = r.id) AS count, ST_AsText(r.polygon) AS polygonWkt -- ★ WKT 추가 FROM regions r WHERE ST_Intersects(r.polygon, ST_GeomFromText(#{bounds5186}, 5186));
